channel.title: Comments on: Episode #43: The Mystery of Capital

item.title: By: Marina Reznik
item.dc:creator: Marina Reznik
item.description:
"Governance not Government!" - Christian Saucier :-D
One of them most pithy ways I've ever heard that concept described! Awesome interview. Fun & informative. - Marina Reznik Realtor & Ubitquity advisor
